function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on controlled visitor access as a primary factor in mitigating disease spread","Impact":"Increase in risk of infection due to overreliance on visitor access control","Mitigation":"Implement additional measures to reduce infection risk, such as improved ventilation and sanitation protocols","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, touchless entry systems","People":"Residents of gated communities","Owner":"Management of gated communities"},{"Description":"Feeling of isolation among residents in gated communities","Impact":"Negative impact on mental and social wellbeing","Mitigation":"Organize community events and activities to foster social connections, and provide access to mental health resources","Technologies":"Virtual event platforms, mental health apps","People":"Residents of gated communities","Owner":"Management of gated communities"},{"Description":"Perception of living in gated communities as safer without sufficient evidence","Impact":"Risk of false sense of security and complacency in following health guidelines","Mitigation":"Promote education on the actual effectiveness of the measures in place and the importance of individual behaviors in preventing disease spread","Technologies":"Informational campaigns, digital communication tools","People":"Residents of gated communities","Owner":"Health agencies and community leaders"}]}
